++ Imaging

Imaging is the storage an entire medium into particular [Files]. This includes:
    * [Files]
    * directories
    * HardDrive]s
    * [Bases]
    * [Configuration]
    * [Memory]

Imaging is mainly used for:
    * state saving
    * [Versioning]
    * [Backup]
    * [Restore]

++Implementation

Imaging is controlled through SpecializedScreens. Images can be utilized outside the system due to ExternalManagement. This is imperative for recovery.
